page.title: 02RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: In 1968{Woodhouse Close Swimming {Baths}were opened.At this time there was only a{swimming pool,but in recent years the addition of a{sauna,jaccuzi and{sunbed suite}has been made. Only this year another addition of{squash {courts}has been built. Also, a{snooker {room, multi-purpose room, fitness room and a{cafe}have been built. When we visited the complex we were shown the{new facilities}and how they work by the manager Mr.Owen. The jaccuzi or spa pool is used by people who want to relax in the hot,bubbly water,while the sauna cleanses the skin at a high temperature. People usually go in the spa pool after the sauna so as to cool down. The new facilities were to be opened the following Saturday,June 29.
